meanings.definition: To move from a lower position to a higher one; come or go up.
meanings.sent1: The sun has risen above the horizon.
meanings.sent2: She has risen from her chair to greet the guests.
meanings.sent3: The balloon has risen so high, it can almost touch the clouds!
meanings.sent4: His spirits have risen like a phoenix from the ashes.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon has risen gracefully into the sky.

meanings.definition: To increase in number, amount, or value.
meanings.sent1: The demand for the product has risen sharply.
meanings.sent2: The temperature has risen steadily throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: The excitement in the room has risen to a fever pitch!
meanings.sent4: Her voice has risen above the noise of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tide has risen to cover the sandy beach.

meanings.definition: To originate or come into being.
meanings.sent1: The idea for the new project has risen during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent2: A sense of camaraderie has risen among the team members.
meanings.sent3: Laughter has risen from the group as they share jokes.
meanings.sent4: Hope has risen in the hearts of the people after the good news.
meanings.sent5: A new star has risen in the music industry.
